quiz_questions.instruction_text: Why is the status of my purchase order showing cancelled?
answer_options: It did not have the required funding.
It did not have the required approval.
It did not have an approved requisition.

quiz_questions.instruction_text: Why was purchase requisition not approved?
answer_options: It was over the spending limit.

quiz_questions.instruction_text: How do I cancel my purchase order?
answer_options: Send an e-mail to the support team.

quiz_questions.instruction_text: How do I cancel my purchase requisition?
answer_options: Send an e-mail to the support team.
